price: Moisés disse: "Lançai". Então, quando lançaram enfeitiçaram os olhos dos homens e assombraram-nos. E chegaram com magnífica magia.
arabic: قَالَ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَآءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla alqū falammā alqaw saḥarū aʿyuna al-nāsi wa-is'tarhabūhum wajāū bisiḥ'rin ʿaẓīmin
